REUTERS.UNKNOWN: E f2325 reute r f BC-SPORTSCENE-ACQUIRES-C 04-07 0045

TEXT.TITLE: SPORTSCENE ACQUIRES CHRISTOPHE VAN HOUTTE CHAIN
TEXT.BODY: (Sportscene Restaurants Inc) said it acquired (Cafe Christophe Van Houtte Inc), a cafe chain with ten franchises and one corporate restaurant, for an unspecified amount of cash and Sportscene shares. Reuter
